---
title: "Mary Magdalene"
---
**The Fierce Loyalist**

**Strengths:** Courageous, faithful, devoted

**Role in God’s Story:** Mary Magdalene follows Jesus through His darkest moments and is the first to witness the resurrection. Her life is a testimony to the healing and transformation that comes from love.

**Where she shows up in the Gospels:**

* [Luke 8:1–3](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Luke+8%3A1-3&version=NIV) – Delivered from demons and follows Jesus
* [Mark 15:40–41](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Mark+15%3A40-41&version=NIV) – Present at the crucifixion
* [John 20:11–18](https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=John+20%3A11-18&version=NIV) – Sees the risen Jesus
